function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Consumers' concrete thinking leading to short-term focus on individual discomfort and impact of guidelines.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of non-compliance with guidelines and continued spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Frame messages to emphasize long-term benefits and societal impact of compliance with guidelines.","Technologies":"Behavioral psychology techniques, targeted messaging, social media campaigns.","People":"Consumers, particularly the Rejectionists.","Owner":"Marketers, public health officials."},{"Description":"Survivalists' hyper-focus on hoarding products in the short term.","Impact":"Increased scarcity of essential products and potential panic-buying behaviors, leading to spread of contagion and economic disruption.","Mitigation":"Educate on the sustainability of supply chains and replenishment of inventory, implement purchasing limits, and promote community support.","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring systems, inventory management tools, community outreach platforms.","People":"Survivalists, consumers, retailers.","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain managers, public health officials."}]}
